title: 10 DIY Slime Hacks Everyone Should Know!

json.text: Hey guys, it's Wengie welcome back,
and here's a extra super bonus hug! So today I'm sharing with you guys ten different
slime hacks that I thought are really useful and would be really helpful for you guys. Of course, if you guys haven't checked out
my three DIY fluffy slimes, I posted that a few days ago, and yeah, that's pretty much
it. But holdup, if you guys aren't part of the fam yet here already, I encourage you guys to join! Just
click the subscribe button. I'm currently running a MacBook Air giveaway! The only other thing you need to do to be part
of the giveaway is to be subscribed to my Reacticorns channel, which is linked down below. That is literally
it. Welcome to the fam guys for those that are new! The other ones, you know i love you so much,
and let's get this video to a hundred and thirty eight thousand thumbs up! That would be amazing!
So I want to thank Quidd for sponsoring this video, and Quidd is a new app where you can collect stickers,
cards, and 3-D figures for free on your phone, and you can find stickers from, like, Powerpuff Girls,
Family Guy, and many other shows, and then just drag and drop these stickers in iMessage so you
can use them in conversations with your friends!
Some of these stickers are super-limited and really rare, but you can also meet people on Quidd
and trade stickers with them, so it's like a really cool community,
and not only can you use them in conversations with your friends, but you can take these stickers from your collection,
and then use them for photos that you already have in  your camera roll, so you can make really cool edits
and new awesome photos to send to your friends! Have a look at what I can do with these stickers!
Ooh!
That's really cool! Put that there.
Put that there.
Ooh, that one's cool. Okay, I
think I'm done! What do you guys think of it? And there are a whole bunch of stickers and cards that are released every single day
including a surprise big new show which is coming real soon and without further
ado, let's get on with the video! Let's go!
If you saw my last slime video
where I made bubblegum slime, you would have seen this hack already, and if you haven't, you have to go check
it out guys! It is linked in the description. I found out you can actually blow bubbles with slime
just by using a straw! Stick the straw into your slime, and the important thing is to make a
seal around the straw with your fingers. Then just blow your bubble and see how big you can make
it! This is so much fun guys, so definitely try it!
If you make a
lot of slime like me, you definitely should consider storing your activator in a separate dispenser bottle.
To make your activator, just dissolve one teaspoon of borax in one cup of warm water.
Then pour this into a dispensing bottle and label it so you don't mistake it for anything else. This
just makes it easier to store and to use, and it's super convenient.
Making the perfect slime swirl is super satisfying, like
how many S's is that? And to swirl your slime you basically need to stretch it out and then fold
it up onto itself and then keep repeating this until you have some nice lines in your slime.
It almost feels like you're making, like, pasta or something! Then you want to give it one last stretch,
and then lay it down round and round into a cute little fruit shape, and you're done!
Yep, pretty satisfying as expected, and to make it even more satisfying, you can, like,
mix multiple colors together and do it, and, like, make unicorn poop! It is amazing!
Making slime isn't always easy, and one of the easiest mistakes to make is to add too much activator.
This makes your slime brittle and break apart easily, rather than stretch when you pull it.
Luckily there's a way to fix this! Just add a few pumps of moisturizer and massage  it
into your slime until it's stretchy again. See? Perfect!
If you love slime as much as me, you've probably got it in your clothes
at some point, and you know how hard it is to get it out. I've literally tried getting this one out for
ages but gave up and now it's super dry and hard and yeah pretty gross looking
but I read that vinegar actually helps clean it up so we're going to test that
out just fill up a bowl with white vinegar and then sweep the slime pot in
for a while
once that's done just wring the vinegar off and then wait what where's the stain
oh my gosh it actually totally melts it away I
honestly didn't expect this at all but you can see a really faint scene where
the slime used to be but yeah guys this hack really works even better than I
hoped it would
if you want to make fluffy slime you can try using foaming hand wash instead of
shaving foam it actually gives a similar effect to shaving foam but it feels more
light and fluffy whereas the shaving foam slime is more dense it also smells
so much nicer than shaving foam so this is also a plus and a really great
variation if you want to try different types of fluffy Slams
if you want a glossy slime just make some hair conditioner and baby oil into
your slime at it bit by bit and mix it well until you're happy with the
glossiness you don't want to put too much oil in because you don't just get
oily which doesn't feel very nice but I love the shininess of this line sitting
around turning it down next mouthful turning up - MS if you don't have any
food coloring or food dye you can still color your slime with markers or
highlighters just make your slime as usual then literally just draw on your
slide with your marker or you can make some fun patterns like I did you may
have to do this a few times to get the amount of color you want but this
definitely works and I thought it was pretty cool and plus you can create all
these designs while you're playing with slime so it's like a double bonus
mr. weenie smell chicken making clear slime is actually pretty tricky
especially if you're new to slime making a problem finding the right clear glue
you should mix in one pot glue with one pot clear water and adding water not
only results in more slime but it makes the slime super clear Here I am testing
to clear slimes one with water added and one without even as I'm mixing the
activator you can see that the glue with water actually look like clearer than
the one without and when there's done I left them to sit in a container for a
while so that the air bubbles settle and you can clearly see the difference like
it is so amazing how much clearer the water makes it
if you accidentally leave slime out in the open LLL lose moisture and become
hard the best way to add moisture back into your slime is to add a small amount
of water and then leave it in the microwave for 20 to 30 seconds when I
did this my slime actually became too soft and I think it's because I added
too much water and then I have to add more activator to make it firm again and
this shows that this has definitely worked and in fact works way too well
but guys would just be very careful with how much water you add because I think a
little goes a long way if you guys learn something new today so I hope you have
some really useful for you guys and that you guys use them if you do just get the
hashtag recon on social media and there during the week and you can follow me
there otherwise don't forget that you can download the kwid up and I've linked
it down below for you guys start selecting stickers and things like that
that's pretty much it I'm going to see you guys in a couple of days actually
because this is the special midweek videos and I'm going to read you guys
are so so so so much so until my next video I'll see you guys then
bye well
